title: The Magic Thief - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   Xuanhuan
tags: Magic   Male Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies
author: Blue Crystal   蓝晶   血珊瑚
description:
This story happened on the vast magic land in middle ages. In the era of expansionism, money dominated everything, conspiracies clouded over the entire land. The magic thief stole with magic, but what he wanted was not wealth, but the interests of groups and nations.

Raboy, a legendary young man who had many roles like charlatan, assassin, magician and noble, quietly surfaced from the haze. He was cold but full of passion, powerful and resourceful. He was the most terrible demon to the enemies, the most perfect lover to the ladies. His mission was to complete a world-wide conspiracy. How far can he walk on the devil’s stage in front of his deadly enemies?>
